Collection.name: Records
Collection.type: Eamon.ThirdParty.BTree`1[[Eamon.Framework.IEffect, Eamon, Version=1.4.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null]], Eamon, Version=1.4.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: As you step up to the water's edge and gaze into it, a pair of large creatures leap from underneath the surface.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The door slides closed behind you, and you slowly start to ascend. After several minutes, the chamber grinds to a halt, and the door slides open again.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Seconds after you push the button, a hidden door seals the chamber, and you start to descend.*004

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Although you do not know your rate of descent, you notice, once you stop, that the entire trip required three minutes, and that the chamber made several direction changes during that time.*005

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The chamber comes to a stop, and the door slides open. Through the dim waters (which can be seen through the walls of the dome to the south), three other illuminated domes can be seen, one large building ahead, and a smaller dome on either side of it...

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A thick metal door slides shut behind you. Ten seconds later, the floor and ceiling begin to radiate a bright red light, and powerful blasts of air rush out of both grillworks. After 20 seconds, the process ceases.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You fiddle with the console buttons, but nothing of any note happens. It probably takes a trained person to operate the machinery.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You hear a faint click, and suddenly water begins to rush in through the grillwork!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You hear a high pitched humming noise, and the water level slowly begins to recede.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: As you push the button, you hear a strange whirring noise, and the parabolic reflector on top of the dome inches upward.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: As you push the button, you hear a strange whirring noise, and the parabolic reflector on top of the dome inches downward.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Pushing this button causes the reflector on top of the dome to rotate in a clockwise manner.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Once you push this button, a red light comes on. Six seconds later, a green light comes on.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: When you push the button, a low droning sound is heard beneath the floor. Then the crystal column glows a bright purple and a bolt of blue light shoots out of the parabolic reflector (a laser unhampered by the light retarding effects of water).

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The worker androids pull pistols out from under their clothing and retaliate!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You push the button, but apparently it can't move much farther up.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You push the button, but apparently it can't move much farther down.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The engraving reads:*019

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: S-A-M-U-R-A-I

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The name plate reads:*021

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Receptionist

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The plaque reads:*023

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: SAMURAI*047

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Established by the government of the United States of America, in the year A.D. Twenty-two Hundred and Eighty-four, to investigate underwater environments for the benefit of the people of our nation and the world.*025

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Jon F. Reeman**049

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The machine vibrates violently for a moment.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The machine makes a horrible clanking sound, and you hear a noise at its base.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The turret is about as high as it can go!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The turret is about as low as it can go!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A red light flashes from the panel.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The field surrounding the energy mace flickers and shorts itself out.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The laser scalpel's blade suddenly vanishes!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The water has completely flooded the room and you have drowned!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: As you open the cabinet, several items appear.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: I'm afraid that these cabinets are sealed shut.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Opening the locker reveals some equipment.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: As you step over the red line, you are hit by an enormous shock!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: It fits, but nothing happens.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You insert the card, but nothing happens.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The oval door quietly slides up, revealing the interior of the dome.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The back wall of this cave is apparently not a sheet of metal, but one of bare rock. The metallic illusion was probably set up by an advanced holograph machine complete with sensory properties to create the illusion of touch.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: After further examination, you discover that even the rock appears to be fake. It's constructed of tough duraplastic. You then succeed in searching out the weakest point in the wall.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You examine it still further, but turn up no more clues.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The section of roof over your head cracks and splits, resulting in a violent implosion which kills everyone in the area.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You suddenly notice a distinct glow forming around the outside of the laboratory. As you progress toward omega, the glow becomes blindingly bright.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The glow surrounding the outside of the lab dims and fades away.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Sub-Aquan Marine United Research*048

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: And Investigation*024

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Secretary of Technological Advancement**050

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: As you stare patiently at the screen, the following message pops up and then disappears shortly:

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You fiddle with a few more buttons, and a document of some sort pops up on the screen. As you read through it, you realize the following:*053

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The android was entering a report concerning the disappearance of a team of four workers sent to investigate a strange life form present in Lake Keeg, some 75 kilometers to the west by northwest. According to the report the androids were **054

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: being attacked by a group of warriors wearing golden body armor. The golden warriors were seemingly immune to the androids' weapons and only one of them managed to escape. The surviving android, however, managed to take a section **055

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: from one of the golden warrior's armor and was attempting to return to the main base with it for further analysis. Soon after, however, all contact was lost with the android and it never returned.*056

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: In response to the loss of the four workers, new androids are presently being grown and are expected to take on full laboratory responsibilities within two weeks. In addition, a strong party of seven heavily armed androids has been **057

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: dispatched to scour the area between Base SAMURAI and Lake Keeg.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The fake-looking back wall is getting chipped away.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The fake-looking back wall is badly chipped up.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The fake-looking back wall has small holes in it.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The fake-looking back wall has enormous holes in it.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The fake-looking back wall is an unsteady pile of rock!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The fake-looking back wall comes tumbling down!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Suddenly, the individual floor tiles on which your party stands sink lower into the ground and the floor becomes electrified!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: SMASH! ZAP! SPARK! Your attack is successful and causes the electrified floor to cease functioning!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The glass walls are slightly cracked.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The glass walls are very badly cracked.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The glass walls are partially smashed out.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The glass walls are smashed into pieces!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You suddenly hear a loud sound, and realize that you have set off an alarm!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: As you ascend into the portal leading back to the Main Hall, a strange feeling, somewhat similar to the one which you experienced before, envelops you and your vision starts to blur. You look back and see the dim images of your **072

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: previous surroundings as they fade away into oblivion.*073

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Then, you find yourself at the familiar inspection area guarded by Lord William Missilefire and his crew. Your head clears and you turn around as you clearly hear the voice of Mayor Frump who, apparently, has been anxiously waiting here **074

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: for you to return.*075

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You feel a sudden startling sensation as all of your memories of the Sub-Aquan Laboratory flood back into your mind, and you prepare to give your report...

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Mayor Frump speaks to you in a suddenly disappointed tone. "You found NOTHING out?" he says, exasperated at your total lack of useful information. Before he stalks miserably away into the portal leading back to his home, you hear him **077

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: quietly mutter, "Oh well, there are always more adventurers where that one came from, perhaps I still have time to find a professional who will be of more use..."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: "Yes, very good!" Mayor Frump exclaims excitedly. "I see you did some professional, high quality exploring! I will put your findings to good use in combating this golden menace and reward you for your troubles!"

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: And with that, the Mayor is gone and you head over to the gates of the Main Hall. Your adventure is over.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You hear a loud sonic boom which echoes over the lake!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You hear a very loud sonic boom that echoes through the laboratory!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This adventure takes place in the Barony Of Horn, part of the Northern Michigan area of the contemporary United States. You and three other fearless Free Adventurers have gathered from far around, hoping for news about the mysterious **083

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: "Golden Marauders."*084

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Upon the request of the Mayor of Horn, one Hubert Frump, your party visits the mayor at his estate, where he then promises you that if you learn anything of significance in this venture, that he will pay you for your information, as well as let you **085

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: take the items that you find while working for him. When you accept, he hands you over to his trusted advisor, Squire Briik, who then tells you the story of these strange golden warriors:@@PB**086

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: "These marauders strike swiftly, and to this very day none of the outlying villages have been able to resist their attacks. As one eyewitness reported, 'They move and act as one unit, and the town guards are practically useless in combating **087

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: them.' Indeed, no weapon brought to bear by the defenders had any effect upon the glowing golden figures.*088

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: "Reports indicate that several villages have been razed by the marauders and, after the attacks, the entire adult populace was captured and led away to the Northwest of Horn. It is speculated that there may also be a connection between the missing **089

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: people, and the ever-increasing number of 'Golden Legionnaires', but any conclusions are hard to draw at this time.@@PB**090

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: "Rumors persist in Horn about our Mayor's strategy to vanquish the golden menace. However, the lack of details has caused speculation to run rampant amongst the town's population.*091

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: "A recent rumor describes the capture of a man armored in golden plate mail who was apprehended to the north of Mucktown. The mayor reveals that the suspect was in fact an android found to be carrying a piece of mysterious gold metal - clearly a **092

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: section of armor or robotic plating.@@PB**093

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: "The android was found about 10 kilometers north of Mucktown as it traveled along the shores of the Great Mitchigoom, heading north. Once subdued, it was brought to Mucktown for questioning. When normal interrogative techniques failed **094

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: due to the circuits controlling the android's brain, the authorities attempted to use a slightly defective mnemonic drainer. Unfortunately, the device destroyed the android's mind, but a good deal of useful information was extracted before the **095

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: prisoner died.*096

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: "The android's mission was somehow related to the golden warriors, but the exact nature of that connection is unknown. The golden armor it was carrying, a breastplate with the word 'REAPER' carved into it, only leads to further unanswered **097

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: questions. The android was returning to its home base, according to the mind probe. This base, which it called 'Samurai', may be found roughly 20 kilometers north along the coast..."@@PB**098

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The mayor's cousin, a local wizard, is then summoned to create a magic stairway which you and your companions may use to enter and exit the base. You make one final visit to the mayor's fancy bathroom and then hurry through the portal into the **099

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: magic stairway, rushing to catch up with your fellow adventurers.*100

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: As you feel your feet land on the magical steps, your surroundings become blurry and your head begins to swim while a dull throbbing sound fills your ears. Although you still seem to be moving, you can't tell if it's by your own power or if **101

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: something is propelling you.@@PB**102

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: After a matter of what seems to be a few minutes, your head clears and you feel a cool breeze on your face. A strong hint of salt tingles your senses awake and you realize that you are in the middle of a solid white, glowing staircase with clear **103

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: exits back into reality at each end.@@PB**104

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Above you hovers a portal back to the Main Hall and below you lies the top of a tall cliff. At the base of the towering cliff you can make out a sandy beach running along a lake of enormous proportions. You start to hear the excited voices of **105

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: your companions coming from the cliff top. It appears they have already spotted a possible entrance to the base in the distance...

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Loosely based on a mini-adventure from Gamma World GW1.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: LARGE OVEN.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: See EAMON CS 1.4 NEW COMMANDS for additional details.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: floor and you can GET ALL.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: to remove from or add to the container.

Collection.name: FreeUids
Collection.type: System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[System.Int64, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]], mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089
